languages.text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.
languages.original_text: Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Противники получают −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} раундов. Союзники получают +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к уклонению на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов.

traits.locale_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Ally weapons: the recoil is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds and the dodge chance of the targets is decreased by −(2 × INT bonus)% for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemy weapons: the recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds and the dodge chance of the targets is increased by +(2 × INT bonus)% for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

languages.text: 极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续{uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。所有盟友的闪避提高{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

traits.locale_text: 极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续{uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。所有盟友的闪避提高{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%，持续{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}轮。

极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}数等同于技术神甫的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低（2×智力加值）%，此{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续轮数等同于技术神甫的智力加值。所有盟友的闪避提高（2×智力加值）%，持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。

极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续轮数等同于{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低（2×智力加值）%，此减值效果持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续轮数等同于技术神甫的智力加值。所有盟友的闪避提高（2×智力加值）%，持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。

languages.text: Todas las armas en un gran radio ganan efectos adicionales: Armas de aliados: el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} se reduce a la mitad durante{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. La {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} de los enemigos se reduce un −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % durante {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. Armas de enemigos: el retroceso aumenta un 50 % durante {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. La esquiva de los aliados aumenta un +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % durante {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos.
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

traits.locale_text: Todas las armas en un gran radio ganan efectos adicionales: Armas de aliados: el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} se reduce a la mitad durante{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. La {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} de los enemigos se reduce un −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % durante {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. Armas de enemigos: el retroceso aumenta un 50 % durante {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos. La esquiva de los aliados aumenta un +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % durante {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} asaltos.

Todas las armas en un gran radio ganan efectos adicionales: Armas de aliados: se reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} a la mitad durante un número de asaltos igual a la {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}. Los enemigos sufren una penalización del −(2 × bonificación por INT) % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante (1 + bonificación por INT) asaltos. Armas de enemigos: se aumenta el retroceso en la mitad durante un número de asaltos igual a la bonificación por INT del tecnosacerdote. Los aliados ganan +(2 × bonificación por INT) % más de esquiva durante (1 + bonificación por INT) asaltos.

languages.text: 広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される。 味方の武器：{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が−{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%低下する。 敵の武器：{uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、反動が半分増加する。{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、味方の回避率が+{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%増加する。
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Allies' dodge is increased by +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% for {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.

traits.locale_text: 広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される。 味方の武器：{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が−{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%低下する。 敵の武器：{uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、反動が半分増加する。{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}ラウンドの間、味方の回避率が+{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}%増加する。

広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される： 味方の武器： 技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、−（2 × INTボーナス）%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 敵の武器：技術司祭のINTボーナスラウンドで反動が半分増加する。味方の回避率が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、+（2 × INTボーナス）%増加する。

広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される： 味方の武器：{uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}と同等のラウンド数の間{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が(1 + INTボーナス)ラウンドの間、−(2 × INTボーナス)%のペナルティを受ける。 敵の武器：技術司祭のINTボーナスと同じ値のラウンド数の間、反動が半分増加する。味方の回避率が(1 + INTボーナス)ラウンドの間、+(2 × INTボーナス)%増加する。

languages.text: Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Противники получают −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} раундов. Союзники получают +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к уклонению на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов.

Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Противники получают −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} раундов. Союзники получают +{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9}% к уклонению на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов.

Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} раундов. Противники получают штраф −(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на бонус ИНТ техножреца раундов. Союзники получают +(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к шансу уклонения на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов.

languages.text: Alle Waffen in einem riesigen Bereich erhalten zusätzliche Effekte: Waffen von Verbündeten: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um die Hälfte erhöht. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} von Feinden wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % verringert. Waffen von Gegnern: Rückstoß wird {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um die Hälfte erhöht. Ausweichen von Verbündeten wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % verringert.

traits.locale_text: Alle Waffen in einem riesigen Bereich erhalten zusätzliche Effekte: Waffen von Verbündeten: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang halbiert. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} von Feinden wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % verringert. Waffen von Gegnern: Rückstoß wird {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang halbiert. Ausweichen von Verbündeten wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} Runden lang um −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % verringert.

Alle Waffen in einem riesigen Gebiet erhalten zusätzliche Effekte: Waffen von Verbündeten: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um die Hälfte reduziert. Gegner erhalten (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden lang einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −(2 × INT-Bonus) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Waffen von Gegnern: Rückstoß INT-Bonus des Techpriesters Runden lang um die Hälfte erhöht. Verbündete haben (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden lang +(2 × INT-Bonus) % Ausweichen.

languages.text: Toutes les armes dans une grande zone bénéficient d'effets supplémentaires : Armes des alliés : le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} est réduit de moitié pendant {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Les ennemis subissent une pénalité d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −{uip|Percent|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} % pendant {uip|Round|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds. Armes des ennemis : le recul augmente de moitié pendant {uip|Rounds|a01295a67a9a46579e46c3073d6a9aa9} rounds.
